page.title: 04Farming.
page.content: Farming is the main occupation of this area. {Maesllwch Home Farm. A farm of 1,300 acres;1,000 acres farm land and 300acres forestry.Of the 1,000acres,700 is cereal and 300grass. {Cereals. {Wheat}-500acres of Winter Wheat grown. Used for bread,cereal,glue,livestock feed and next year's seeds. {Barley}-for beer and whiskey making & animal feed.{ {Oats}- for breakfast cereal & race - horse feed. {Machinery}- 6 tractors,1 large combine (2 more hired when needed),1 mower & silage waggons,corn drill, sprayer & plough. {Workforce}- 9 farm workers, including farm manager,& 3 forestry workers most of whom live in houses on the estate. More men are brought in when needed.
